# Simple Test Document

## Introduction

This is a simple text document that will be used for testing basic document processing functionality.

## Content Sections

### Section 1: Overview

The document processing system should be able to extract text content, identify headings, and preserve the document structure.

### Section 2: Key Features

- Text extraction
- Heading preservation
- Markdown formatting

## Conclusion

This document serves as a basic test case for the document processing system.
